name: The THICC hooker ;) _for fishing purposes only.
name_original: The THICC hooker ;) _for fishing purposes only.
description:
A 3D game based on polymars's idea of fishing trash out of the ocean. But I'm not a complete thief so I added in some personnel touches ;)

Try  to score 30k to win.

Instruction: - Use mouse to move the hook - Hover over trash to grab it (no clicking needed) -  Drag the trash to the bin -Right click to reset the hook's position -DON'T HOOK THE FISH. Enjoy... Forgive the roughness and bugs.
